text: Jan Ras (born 28 January 1999) is a Dutch footballer who plays as a midfielder for SC Heerenveen in the Dutch Eredivisie. ==Professional career== Ras is a youth product of SC Heerenveen, having joined them at the age of 8.https://frieschdagblad.nl/2019/8/12/ook-jongensdromen-zijn-vaak-bedrog-maar- niet-voor-debutant-jan-ras?harvest_referrer=https:%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F On 7 December 2017, Ras signed his first professional contract with Heerenveen for 3 years. Ras made his professional debut with Heerenveen in a 1-1 Eredivisie tie with Feyenoord on 11 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Urk Category:Dutch footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:SC Heerenveen players Category:Eredivisie players
title: Jan Ras
